member.name: M:MataSharp.Attachment.Download(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the current attachment.
member.param: Boolean value whether to add the UserID in front of the filename or not.
The directory to save the file to.
member.returns: A string containting the path to the location of the downloaded attachment.

member.summary: Gets the DayOfWeek from the current DateTime instance in Dutch.

member.returns: The current DateTime instance as a string.

member.name: M:MataSharp.Extensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the current string to a DateTime.

member.name: T:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder
member.summary: Folder that contains MagisterMessage instances.
Folder that contains MagisterMessage instances.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.WhereUnread(System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Checks for new messages on the parent's mata server.
member.param: Ammount to ask for on the server.
Ammount of messages to skip | Default = 0
member.returns: List of unread MagisterMessages.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.WhereUnread
member.summary: Gets ALL the new messages on the parent's mata server.
member.returns: List of unread MagisterMessages.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.RemoveAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: CAUTION: Permanently deletes the given message from the server.
member.param: The zero-based index of the element to remove.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.RemoveRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: CAUTION: Permanently deletes the given messages from the server.
member.param: The zero-based starting index of the range of elements to remove.
The number of elements to remove.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.GetRange(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the given range of MagisterMessages.
member.param: The zero-based index at which the range starts.
The number of elements in the range.
member.returns: The given range of MagisterMessages as a List

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.IndexOf(MataSharp.MagisterMessage)
member.summary: Gets the zero-based position of the given item on the server.
member.param: The item to get its position from.
member.returns: A zero-based index of the position of the given item.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.RemoveAll(System.Int32,System.Predicate{MataSharp.MagisterMessage})
member.summary: CAUTION: Permanently deletes the given messages from the server.
member.param: The ammount of messages to check for on the server.
The predicate the messages must match to.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Where(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the messages that matches the given predicate.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the messages must match
member.returns: A List containing the messages that matched the predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.First(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the first message that matches the given predicate. Throws exception when nothing is found.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the message must match.
member.returns: The first message on the server that matches the predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Last(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the last message that matches the given predicate. Throws exception when nothing is found.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the message must match.
member.returns: The last message on the server that matches the predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.FirstOrDefault(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the first message that matches the given predicate. Gives back the default of the object if nothing is found.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the message must match.
member.returns: The first message on the server that matches the predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.LastOrDefault(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Gets the last message that matches the given predicate. Gives back the default of the object if nothing is found.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the message must match.
member.returns: The last message on the server that matches the predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Any(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks if there is a message on the server that matches the given predicate.
member.param: The max value to check for on the server.
The predicate the message must match.
member.returns: A boolean value that tells if there is a message matching the given predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Single(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns the single message on the server that matches the given predicate. Throws expception when more matching messages or none are found.
member.param: The predicate that the message must match to.
The max ammount of messages to get from the server.
member.returns: A single MagisterMessage matching the given predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.SingleOrDefault(System.Int32,System.Func{MataSharp.MagisterMessage,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Returns the single message on the server that matches the given predicate. Throws expception when more matching messages are found. When no matching messages are found, returns the default value.
member.param: The max ammount of messages to get from the server.
The predicate that the message must match to.
member.returns: A single MagisterMessage matching the given predicate.

member.name: M:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Contains(MataSharp.MagisterMessage)
member.summary: Checks if the given messages exist on the servers.
member.param: The item to check if it exists.
member.returns: A boolean value telling if the given message exists.

member.name: P:MataSharp.MagisterMessageFolder.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the item on the given index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the item to get.
member.returns: The item on the given index.
